subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees have invested $175 million in Masahiro Tanaka, who will be out at least six weeks with a small tear in his elbow. The team has now lost four starting pitchers.
snippet: The Yankees have invested $175 million in Masahiro Tanaka, who will be out at least six weeks with a small tear in his elbow. The team has now lost four starting pitchers.
